author: @shashankns5994
text: For people who are using Ubuntu, the menuBar doesn't appear because it's a feature of Ubuntu's Unity shell called global menu bar.  So, if you want your menu to take its place on top of a window regardless of graphical shell preferences, you should use Qt menu bar instead of native one:          mainMenu = QtGui.QMenuBar()         mainMenu.setNativeMenuBar(False)         self.setMenuBar(mainMenu)                  fileMenu = mainMenu.addMenu('File')         fileMenu.addAction(extractAction)
